page.title: 15Southam's Interesting People
page.content: We have many people in Southam with interesting jobs. They all help us in a different way. Our town{mayor} follows a ten year tradition. The first mayor was a pupil at St. Mary's School. Our present mayor is a butcher just like his father was 50 years ago. In his role as mayor he wears no ceremonial outfit, only a chain of office. He leads the town council and attends many meetings and social functions. Many people go to him for help with their problems. Someone else who helps us is the {lollipop lady.}She has an important but dangerous job because she has to go into the middle of the road to cross the children over. So she can be seen she wears a hat and a white and orange coat and she carries a stick which looks like a large lollipop. Southam has had 3 lollipop ladies.
